item.title: 多米尼加共和国派领导人赴华盛顿参加关税谈判
item.description: 多米尼加共和国本周将派代表团前往华盛顿，就唐纳德-特朗普政府不顾多米尼加对美国的贸易逆差而对该国征收 10%关税一事展开谈判。【原文：The Dominican Republic is sending a delegation to Washington this week to begin negotiations over the 10% tariffs that the Donald Trump administration slapped on the country despite its trade deficit with the US.】

item.title: 美联储预估显示联邦劳动力可能缩减 120 万人
item.description: 根据亚特兰大联邦储备银行的分析，美国联邦政府的员工总数可能会缩减 100 多万人，这主要反映了政府通过合同和拨款间接雇用的人员估计会减少。【原文：The broader US federal workforce could shrink by more than 1 million, according to an analysis from the Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta, largely reflecting an estimated reduction in those indirectly employed by the government through contracts and grants.】

item.title: 中国茶叶连锁店赴美上市为众多上市候选者带来希望
item.description: 中国茶叶连锁企业茶叶控股有限公司（Chagee Holdings Ltd. ）在 2025 年 4 月完成了一项看似不可能完成的壮举：不仅在关税大战中成功在美国上市，而且股价还高于发行价。它的成功经验为考虑进行交易的公司带来了一线希望。【原文：Chinese tea chain Chagee Holdings Ltd. managed what in April 2025 seems like an impossible feat: not only did it pull off a successful US IPO in the middle of a tariff war, its shares are trading above its offering price. Its playbook offers a few rays of hope for firms considering going ahead with deals.】

item.title: Roblox 用户组再现现实生活中的大规模枪击事件
item.description: 一群 Roblox 用户正在这个深受孩子们喜爱的游戏平台上重现现实生活中的校园枪击事件，包括柯伦拜高中和得克萨斯州乌瓦尔德市罗布小学的袭击事件。【原文：A group of Roblox users is re-creating real life school shooting incidents on the gaming platform that’s popular with kids, including attacks at Columbine High School and the Robb Elementary School in Uvalde, Texas.】

item.title: 智利政府取消提高高收入者所得税的计划
item.description: 智利财政部长马里奥-马塞尔（Mario Marcel）周一表示，智利政府将 "无限期推迟 "拟议中的所得税改革。【原文：Chile’s government will “indefinitely postpone” its proposed income tax reform that envisioned higher rates on top individual earners and lower corporate levies, Finance Minister Mario Marcel said on Monday.】

item.title: 原来世界上的特朗普贸易是 "卖美国
item.description:
随着各国政府和投资者对美元和债券失去信心，美国总统对美联储的攻击正使世界进一步偏离美国轴心。【原文：

The president's attacks on the Fed are pushing the world further off its American axis, as governments and investors lose confidence in the US dollar and bonds.

】

item.title: 对冲基金 Verition 聘请前汇丰银行交易员加入拉丁美洲团队
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，多行政对冲基金 Verition Fund Management 已聘请了汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的前交易员 Alfredo Alarcon。【原文：Multistrategy hedge fund Verition Fund Management has hired Alfredo Alarcon, a former trader at HSBC Holdings Plc, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储资产负债表上的 "上升线 "提供了投资组合缩减命运的线索
item.description: 美联储资产负债表中一个经常被忽视的部分一直在增长，这可能会增强美联储比预期更早地停止缩减投资组合的能力。【原文：An often overlooked segment of the Federal Reserve’s balance sheets has been growing and could boost the Fed’s ability to stop shrinking its portfolio sooner than expected.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会因联合举报人的执法线索向其奖励 600 万美元
item.description: 联合举报人将获得 600 万美元，因为他们提供了新信息，促使美国证券交易委员会进行检查，并帮助采取了执法行动。【原文：Joint whistleblowers will receive $6 million for providing new information that prompted a US Securities and Exchange Commission examination and helped lead to an enforcement action.】

item.title: 百万富翁税将带来约 4000 亿美元的收入
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社获得的两份最新估算，共和党向百万富翁增税的提议将在十年内带来约 4000 亿美元的收入，从而提供新的收入来部分抵消该党数万亿美元税收方案的成本。【原文：A Republican proposal to impose a tax hike on millionaires offers to generate about $400 billion over a decade, according to two new estimates provided to Bloomberg News, providing fresh revenue to partially offset the cost of the party’s multi-trillion-dollar tax package.】

item.title: 优步因 "欺骗性 "订阅注册被美国联邦贸易委员会起诉
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会起诉优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. was sued by the US Federal Trade Commission, which claims the rideshare and delivery company hurt consumers through “deceptive billing and cancellation practices” as part of its flagship subscription service.】

item.title: Circle 计划建立由稳定币驱动的跨境支付网络
item.description: 据不愿透露姓名的知情人士透露，第二大稳定币发行商 Circle Internet Group Inc.【原文：Circle Internet Group Inc., the issuer of the second-largest stablecoin, is launching a payments network designed to allow financial institutions and technology firms to settle cross-border transactions in stablecoins, according to people familiar with the matter who asked not to be identified sharing non-public plans.】

item.title: 黄金和类现金 ETF 因投资者寻求安全而吸金
item.description: 多年来，一有风吹草动，投资者就会涌入高风险资产，如今，他们开始将部分资金转移到另一个方向，即安全方向。【原文：After years of diving into risky assets at every sign of trouble, investors are starting to move some of their money in the other direction — toward safety.】

item.title: 住宅改造是资产支持债券市场的下一个目标
item.description: 据 Kroll 债券评级机构的一份报告称，房主用于支付修缮或翻新费用的贷款正越来越多地被打包成债券，随着利率和房价的持续走高，这一领域有望继续增长。【原文：Loans that homeowners use to pay for fixes or renovations are increasingly being packaged into bonds, and the sector is poised to keep growing as interest rates and home prices stay elevated, according to a report by Kroll Bond Rating Agency.】

item.title: 南卡罗来纳学院急需 600 万美元保住校园
item.description: 南卡罗来纳州的 Limestone 大学正处于十字路口：这所拥有 179 年历史的学校在本周二之前需要 600 万美元才能继续开展所有现有项目。【原文：Limestone University in South Carolina is at a crossroads: The 179-year-old school needs $6 million by Tuesday to continue all of its existing programs.】

item.title: 穆迪与摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI）推出衡量私人信贷风险的服务
item.description: 摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI）和穆迪公司（Moody's Corp）正在推出一个提供私人信用贷款风险评估的平台，以满足以不透明著称的市场对信息的需求。【原文：MSCI Inc. and Moody’s Corp. are launching a platform to provide risk assessments on private credit loans, in a bid to capitalize on demand for information on a market known for its opacity.】

item.title: 韩国造船商韩华抓住机会建造美国液化天然气油轮
item.description: 一家韩国造船厂计划建造第一艘美国制造的液化天然气油轮，这是继美国贸易机构提出对中国制造的船舶征税的全面建议之后的又一举措，旨在打击中国在该行业的主导地位。【原文：A South Korean shipbuilder plans to construct the first US-built liquefied natural gas tanker, following sweeping recommendations from a US trade agency that would tax ships made in China and aim to combat the Asian nation’s dominance in the industry.】

item.title: 扎克伯格资助的硅谷学校将于明年关闭
item.description: 由马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）的妻子普莉希拉-陈（Priscilla Chan）共同创办的小学（The Primary School）是一所免学费的私立学校，有 543 名学生。【原文：The Primary School, a tuition-free private school with 543 students co-founded by Mark Zuckerberg’s wife Priscilla Chan, will shutter its doors after roughly a decade in operation.】

item.title: 货币经理人在经历暴跌后仍认为存在购买小额债券的机会
item.description: 本月早些时候，关税引发的暴跌导致收益率飙升，随着市政债券开始缓慢复苏，市政债券看起来很有吸引力。【原文：Municipal bonds are looking attractive as they slowly start to recover from the tariff-fueled rout that sent yields soaring earlier this month.】

item.title: 从肉类到谷物，贸易战利好巴西和阿根廷
item.description: 巴西和阿根廷正在成为颠覆农产品市场的全球贸易战的早期赢家。【原文：Brazil and Argentina are emerging as early winners in the global trade war that’s upending agricultural markets.】

item.title: 日本保险公司 MS&AD 计划投资多达 50 亿美元使美国利润翻番
item.description: MS&AD保险集团控股公司首席执行官表示，该公司计划投资高达约7000亿日元（约合50亿美元）拓展北美市场，以实现在该地区营业利润翻番的目标。【原文：MS&AD Insurance Group Holdings Inc. plans to invest as much as about ¥700 billion ($5 billion) to expand in the North American market, to meet its goal of doubling operating profits in the region, according to its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 新兴市场资产受 "抛售美国 "交易提振反弹
item.description: 本周初，发展中世界的货币和股票攀升，原因是美国股市持续走低，促使投资者开始关注价值被低估的新兴市场资产。【原文：Currencies and stocks in the developing world climbed at the start of the week, propelled by an ongoing rotation away from the US that’s pushing investors to look at undervalued emerging-market assets.】

item.title: 全球加工量超出预期，可可涨势扩大
item.description: 可可期货攀升至两周多来的最高点，因为通常被用来代表全球需求的关键加工数据上周好于预期。【原文：Cocoa futures climbed to the highest in more than two weeks after key processing data, often used as a proxy for global demand, beat expectations last week.】

item.title: 墨西哥谢因鲍姆称特朗普通话后贸易谈判仍在继续
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）表示，在上周墨西哥总统与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）就美国对墨西哥南部邻国部分商品征收关税一事进行会谈后，双方尚未达成任何协议。【原文：Mexico’s President Claudia Sheinbaum said there’s no agreement yet with her US counterpart Donald Trump after the two spoke last week about US tariffs on some of its southern neighbor’s goods.】

item.title: 对冲基金皮克顿称避开贸易政策混乱的杠杆公司
item.description: 交易策略师杰夫-菲普斯（Geoff Phipps）表示，美国经济数据可能会恶化，导致对冲基金皮克顿-马霍尼资产管理公司（Picton Mahoney Asset Management）采取更具防御性的观点，削减对债务风险过高的公司的投资。【原文：US economic data is likely to worsen, causing hedge fund Picton Mahoney Asset Management to take a more defensive view and cut exposure to companies with too much debt risk, trading strategist Geoff Phipps said.】

item.title: 如果特朗普解雇杰罗姆-鲍威尔，他还能得到什么？
item.description:
忘记长期成本吧。短期收益是什么？【原文：

Forget the long term cost. What’s the short-term gain?

】

item.title: 摩根士丹利利用新的 E*Trade 平台打击日内交易者
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的 E*Trade 业务刚刚创下数年来最高交易量，该公司正在加大力度，通过一个新平台接触最活跃的日间交易者。【原文：Morgan Stanley, whose E*Trade business just posted its highest-volume trading days in years, is ramping up efforts to reach the most-active day traders with a new platform.】

item.title: 特朗普警告：如果鲍威尔不降息，美国经济可能放缓
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普警告说，如果美联储不立即采取行动降低利率，美国经济可能会放缓，这是他对美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的最新抨击。【原文：President Donald Trump warned the US economy may slow if the Federal Reserve does not move to immediately reduce interest rates, in his latest broadside against Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 智利有自己的米莱，自由主义者同样激进
item.description: 维克多-埃斯皮诺萨（Victor Espinosa）的办公桌上摆放着哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）挥舞电锯的小模型，他为智利制定的计划与阿根廷总统的自由主义政策一样激进。【原文：Victor Espinosa has a small model of Javier Milei wielding a chainsaw on his desk and a plan for Chile that is every bit as radical as the Argentine president’s libertarian policies.】

item.title: 利润增长逆势上扬，阿波罗支持的 Autodoc 着眼于 2025 年上市
item.description: Autodoc SE 高层表示，随着去年利润和收入的增长，Autodoc SE 正在为最早于今年夏天进行首次公开募股做准备。【原文：Autodoc SE is gearing up for an initial public offering as early as this summer as profit and revenue grew last year, according to its executives.】
